name: Hero Generations
blurb: An Indie strategy/rogue-like about life, legacy & love from the creator of Highgrounds. Lovingly dubbed "The 5-Minute Civilization."

rewards.reward: COPY OF THE GAME =============================\r\nReceive a DRM-free copy of Hero Generations when it is released for PC & Mac platforms, or Steam if we're Greenlit ($5 off the retail price). Plus see your name live on forever in the credits!

GAME COPY + SOUNDTRACK =============================\r\nGet a digital download of the original game soundtrack composed by Andrew Riley, In addition to a copy of the game and your name in the credits!

BETA ACCESS + YOUR NAME IN THE GAME *EARLY BIRD!*\r\n=============================\r\nEverything in the $25 reward for only $20! Includes exclusive early access to the beta version of the game! Plus, backers at this level will be immortalized by having their name (or a name of their choice we deem appropriate) added to the random name generator for NPCs and Heroes! Also includes everything at the $15 tier.

BETA ACCESS + YOUR NAME IN THE GAME + $15 TIER! \r\n=============================\r\nGet exclusive early access to the beta version of the game! Plus, backers at this level will be immortalized by having their name (or a name of their choice we deem appropriate) added to the random name generator for NPCs and Heroes! Also includes everything at the $15 tier.

DIGITAL ART BOOK + $25 TIER! ============================= Get everything at the $25 tier, plus receive a digital art book that includes concept art, game assets, behind the scenes notes, and other history of Hero Generations in PDF format!

TWO COPIES OF GAME + $30 TIER! ============================= Get everything at the $30 tier, plus receive a 2nd DRM-free copy of Hero Generations to share with a loved one when it is released for PC & Mac platforms. (an additional $10 savings!)
NAME A BOSS MONSTER + $35 TIER!\r\n=============================\r\nBackers at this tier can live in infamy by adding their name to the short list of random names given to the world boss monsters!

DESIGN A FAMILY CREST + $50 TIER! ============================= Everything at the $50 tier, plus help us design the visuals for a family crest that players can choose from to represent their family in game. You'll also be added to the credits as a "Family Crest Designer."

DESIGN AN ITEM + $100 TIER!\r\n============================= Everything at the $100 tier, plus help us design the visuals for an epic rare item in the game. "Forged by <YOUR NAME>" will also appear in the shop description for the item!

DESIGN A CHARACTER TRAIT + $100 TIER!\r\n=============================\r\nEverything at the $100 tier, plus help us design a unique character trait that can be passed down for generations in the game! You'll be added to the credits as a "Kickstarter Designer" to show our thanks for your generous contribution.

NAME AS FINAL BOSS + DESIGN DOCS + $50 TIER!\r\n=============================\r\nEverything at the $50 tier, plus live in infamy by adding your name to the very short list of random names given to the one and only end game boss demon! We'll also share our working design documents for you to follow along with!

JOIN THE FAMILY + $325 TIER!\r\n=============================\r\nIn addition to everything at the $325 reward level, you'll get a 30 minute skype chat with the design team where you can play the latest build, offer feedback, and get a first hand look at what we're up to during development before anyone else. We'll also share our working design documents for you to follow along with!

YOUR LIKENESS IN GAME + $400 TIER!\r\n=============================\r\nIn addition to everything at the $400 reward level, Dominic will draw you and a loved one as Hero Generations characters! We'll add the finished parts into the random character generator in game, and send you a cool high-resolution self portrait image to keep forever!
